attributes.action: Reduce the Foreign aid budget by 50% and use the money to fund the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
If 6.1 billion pounds was invested in the NHS instead of the Foreign aid budget the health and well-being of the people of the UK would be improved.
NHS hospitals have a deficit of 2.5 billion pounds, there is no spare money for investment in the NHS.
attributes.background: The Foreign aid budget is now 12.2 billion pounds and rising. The NHS is in crisis with hospitals and healthcare centres underfunded, and some closing due to lack of funds.
